IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO PROVIDE HEALTH, SECURITY, DEATH AND OTHER SUPPLEMENTAL WELFARE BENEFITS TO ELIGIBLE PARTICIPANTS AND THEIR BENEFICIARIES.
IRS990.MissionDesc: TO PROVIDE HEALTH, SECURITY, DEATH AND OTHER SUPPLEMENTAL WELFARE BENEFITS TO ELIGIBLE PARTICIPANTS AND THEIR BENEFICIARIES.
IRS990.Desc: TO PROVIDE HEALTH, SECURITY, DEATH AND OTHER SUPPLEMENTAL WELFARE BENEFITS TO ELIGIBLE PARTICIPANTS AND THEIR BENEFICIARIES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE PLAN (AND ITS RELATED TRUST) ARE INTENDED TO BE EXEMPT FROM FEDERAL INCOME TAX UNDER THE PROVISIONS OF SECTION 501(C)(5) OF THE INTERNAL REVENUE CODE (IRC), AS AMENDED AND HAS OBTAINED A FAVORABLE DETERMINATION LETTER FROM THE INTERNAL REVENUE SERVICE (IRS) DATED FEBRUARY 1986. THE PLAN HAS BEEN AMENDED SINCE RECEIVING THE DETERMINATION LETTER. HOWEVER, THE PLAN'S TRUSTEES AND THE PLAN'S COUNSEL BELIEVE THAT THE PLAN IS CURRENTLY DESIGNED AND BEING OPERATED IN COMPLIANCE WITH THE APPLICABLE REQUIREMENTS OF THE IRC. THE PLAN'S MANAGEMENT EVALUATES TAX POSITIONS TAKEN BY THE PLAN AND RECOGNIZES A TAX LIABILITY OR ASSET IF AN UNCERTAIN TAX POSITION WAS TAKEN AND IT IS MORE LIKELY THAN NOT THAT THE TAX POSITION WOULD NOT BE SUSTAINED UPON EXAMINATION BY TAXING AUTHORITIES. THE PLAN IS SUBJECT TO ROUTINE AUDITS BY TAXING JURISDICTIONS.
WRITE-OFF OF LEASEHOLD IMPROVEMENTS NOT FULLY DEPRECIATED AT TIME OF MOVE -110,893.
WRITE-OFF OF LEASEHOLD IMPROVEMENTS NOT FULLY DEPRECIATED AT TIME OF MOVE 110,893.

COMPENSATION FROM UNRELATED ORGANIZATIONS: WILLIAM SWEENEY - TOTAL COMPENSATION REPORTED BY UNITED SERVICE WORKERS UNION IUJAT - NATIONAL UNION (UNRELATED ORGANIZATION) AMOUNTED TO $390,839 CONSISTING OF $322,477 IN REPORTABLE W-2 COMPENSATION AND $68,362 IN CONTRIBUTIONS TO EMPLOYEE BENEFIT PLANS. 64% OF SALARIES AND BENEFITS PAID IS REIMBURSED BY THE FILING ORGANIZATION. THE FUND IS PARTY TO ADMINISTRATIVE SERVICES AGREEMENTS WITH UNITED SERVICE WORKERS UNION, IUJAT, INTERNATIONAL UNION OF JOURNEYMEN AND ALLIED TRADES AND SERVICE PROFESSIONALS UNION, LOCAL 726, IUJAT. THESE AGREEMENTS PROVIDE, AMONGST OTHER THINGS, A COST SHARING MECHANISM FOR CERTAIN REASONABLE ADMINISTRATIVE AND OPERATIONAL COSTS DEEMED NECESSARY FOR THE OPERATION AND ADMINISTRATION OF THE FUND. DURING THE TAX REPORTING PERIOD ENDING APRIL 30, 2022, THE FUND REIMBURSED USWU, IUJAT AND LOCAL 726 $1,255,638 FOR THE FUNDS SHARE OF SUCH COSTS WHICH INCLUDED A COMPONENT OF PERSONNEL COMPENSATION AND RELATED BENEFIT COSTS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 2
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: JONATHAN AMES AND LORI AMES- FAMILY RELATIONSHIP

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: A DRAFT OF THE FORM 990 WAS PREPARED BY THE OUTSIDE ACCOUNTING FIRM WITH ASSISTANCE FROM FUND PERSONNEL AND LEGAL COUNSEL AND PRESENTED TO THE CONTROLLER FOR INITIAL REVIEW. THE CONTROLLER THEN CIRCULATED A COPY OF THE DRAFT FORM 990 TO THE FUND ADMINISTRATOR, FUND'S TRUSTEES, OFFICERS AND LEGAL COUNSEL. AFTER FURTHER REVIEW AND COMPLETION OF ANY OPEN ITEMS, THE FINAL DOCUMENT WAS CIRCULATED TO ALL OF THE OFFICERS AND TRUSTEES. WHO, AFTER THEIR OWN REVIEW, WERE CANVASSED FOR APPROVAL FOR ACCEPTANCE AND AUTHORIZATION TO FILE THE FORM 990 BEFORE ITS DUE DATE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE TRUSTEES OF THE FUND AT THEIR REGULAR MEETINGS TAKE UP THE BUSINESS OF THE ORGANIZATION WHICH MAY INCLUDE INSTANCES WHERE A CONFLICT OF INTEREST MAY HAVE OCCURED OR IS SUBJECT OF DISCUSSION. IF A CONFLICT OF INTEREST IS PRESENTED, THE TRUSTEES TAKE APPROPRIATE ACTION WITH ANY CONFLICTED MEMBER ABSTAINING FROM PARTICIPATION IN THE DISCUSSION AND VOTE. ALL TRUSTEES, OFFICERS AND EMPLOYEES ARE COVERED BY CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FUND'S GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE AVAILABLE TO ALL MEMBERS UPON REQUEST. DOCUMENTS ARE MADE AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC TO THE EXTENT REQUIRED BY LAW.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VII - COLUMN (B) AVG HOURS:
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: HOURS RECORDED ARE AN ESTIMATE OF AVERAGE HOURS WORKED PER WEEK AMONGST THE TAX EXEMPT ORGANIZATIONS THAT THE INDIVIDUAL HOLDS POSITIONS IN, WHERE WORK IS ASSIGNED AS A REQUIRED COMPONENT OF THE PERSON'S PRIMARY EMPLOYMENT. AS ALLOCATED, WORK TIME IS DEVOTED TO PROVIDE NECESSARY SUPPORT AND SERVICES NEEDED BY THE RESPECTIVE ORGANIZATIONS' PROGRAMS.
